Posts.EditableText:
Not sure how best to report this, but trying to play a game online yields:

[code:2kb4rve3]Error loading game:
There is not enough space on the disk.[Sorry, an error occurred][/code:2kb4rve3]

I assume that's a server error of some sort...
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Email is always a good option...

But thanks for reporting this, the server had indeed run out of disk space - too many temp files. Cleared now.
